introduce.title: We Come to You
introduce.desc: Our professional mixologists will set up at your chosen venue.

introduce.title: Dedicated Mixologist
introduce.desc: 1 mixologist is assigned per 10–15 guests, ensuring a fully personalised experience.

introduce.title: 2 Cocktails per Bar Station
introduce.desc: Each bar station includes 2 signature cocktails — learn, mix, and enjoy.

introduce.title: Hands-On Session (35–40 min per cocktail)
introduce.desc: Step-by-step guidance with plenty of time to shake, stir, and sip.

introduce.title: Everything Provided
introduce.desc: Rest assured, we provide all the spirits, fresh ingredients, and top-notch equipment on the day, so you can craft the perfect cocktail with ease!

introduce.title: Perfect for Every Event
introduce.desc: team-building activity, unique celebration, or get-together with friends — we bring the cocktails, you bring the fun.
